metadata.title: CVE-2017-5208 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the wrestool program in icoutils before 0.31.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via acrafted executable, which triggers a denial of service (application crash)or the possibility of execution of arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icoutils - 0.31.0-2+deb8u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icoutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.31.0-2+deb8u2build0.14.04.1').
